statements: DELETE FROM robot_inventory WHERE location = 'Assembly Line';
DELETE FROM robot_inventory WHERE quantity < 5 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM robot_parts WHERE part_id = 1 AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM robot_components WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND part_id IN (SELECT part_id FROM robot_parts WHERE quantity > 10);
DELETE FROM lab_inventory WHERE inventory_name = 'Sensors' AND inventory_type = 'Electronic';
DELETE FROM robot_components WHERE component_name = 'Servo Motor';
DELETE FROM component_parts WHERE quantity < 5 AND part_id = 201;
DELETE FROM components WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.' AND price > 100.00;
